result.ga: Cuir ort do chuid éadaí
result.html: Cuir ort do chuid éadaíPut on your clothes.
result.ponchtml: Cuir ort do ċuid éadaíPut on your clothes.

result.ga: Cá bhfuil do chuid éadaí
result.html: Cá bhfuil do chuid éadaíWhere are your clothes?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil do ċuid éadaíWhere are your clothes?

result.eng: Who would pay for such badly made clothes?
result.ga: Cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sin
result.orig: Cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sin
result.html: Cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sinWho would pay for such badly made clothes?
result.ponchtml: Cé a d'íocfaḋ airgead ar éadaí a ḃí déanta ċoṁ dona sinWho would pay for such badly made clothes?

result.eng: She started taking her clothes off.
result.ga: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí di
result.orig: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí di
result.html: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí diShe started taking her clothes off.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ sí ag baint a cuid éadaí diShe started taking her clothes off.

result.eng: I have a shower, I put my clothes on, I brush my teeth, and so on.
result.ga: Bíonn cithfholcadh agam cuirim orm mo chuid éadaí glanaim mo chuid fiacla agus mar sin de
result.orig: Bíonn cithfholcadh agam cuirim orm mo chuid éadaí glanaim mo chuid fiacla agus mar sin de
result.html: Bíonn cithfholcadh agam cuirim orm mo chuid éadaí glanaim mo chuid fiacla agus mar sin deI have a shower, I put my clothes on, I brush my teeth, and so on.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn ciṫḟolcaḋ agam cuirim orm mo ċuid éadaí glanaim mo ċuid fiacla agus mar sin deI have a shower, I put my clothes on, I brush my teeth, and so on.

result.ga: Bain díot do chuid éadaí
result.html: Bain díot do chuid éadaíTake off your clothes.
result.ponchtml: Bain díot do ċuid éadaíTake off your clothes.

result.eng: They left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ga: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.orig: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.html: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaiḋ agus isteaċ leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.

result.eng: She was a manager in a clothes factory.
result.ga: Ba bhainisteoir i monarcha éadaí í
result.orig: Ba bhainisteoir i monarcha éadaí í
result.html: Ba bhainisteoir i monarcha éadaí íShe was a manager in a clothes factory.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃainisteoir i monarċa éadaí íShe was a manager in a clothes factory.

result.eng: Of course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
result.ga: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaithe
result.orig: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaithe
result.html: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaitheOf course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
result.ponchtml: Ar ndóiġ ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a ḃí na trádálaiṫeOf course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
